sentences.sContent: He moved to the seaside for the sake of his health.
sentences.sCn: 他为了健康而迁居海滨。

sentences.sContent: I only went for Kay’s sake.
I hope he’s told the truth for his own sake (= because it will be good for him ) .
sentences.sCn: 为了他自己好，我希望他已经说出了真相。

sentences.sContent: ...instead of innovation for innovation's sake and new products being created simply because the technology is there...
...If schools allow student-athletes to regularly miss out on instructional time for the sake of traveling to athletic competitions...
...for the sake of the global economy...
...For the sake of increasing their odds of landing a better job...

synos.tran: 目的；利益；理由；日本米酒

trans.tranOther: in order to help, improve, or please someone or something
